channel.title: CVE Feed for Positron S.R.L -- Broadcast Signal Processor TRA7005
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Positron S.R.L -- Broadcast Signal Processor TRA7005

item.title: CVE-2024-7007|2024-08-01T21:45:38.372Z -- positron%20s.r.l -- broadcast%20signal%20processor%20tra7005
item.description: Positron Broadcast Signal Processor TRA7005 v1.20 is vulnerable to an authentication bypass exploit that could allow an attacker to have unauthorized access to protected areas of the application.
